azureLogAnalytics.query:
KubeEvents 
| where Namespace in ($namespace)
| project TimeGenerated, Name, Namespace, Reason, Message, KubeEventType

targets.expr:
sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status!~"^[4-5].*", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) / 
(sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval])) - 
(sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"404|499", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__interval]))))
